headline: Berkshire Hathaway's Q4 Earnings and Revenues Rise Year Over Year
summary: BRK.B's Q4 results reflect higher earnings in Insurance-underwriting, Insurance-investment income, Berkshire Hathaway Energy Company and non-controlled businesses.
